flavor: "This is a threat unlike any you've faced before!"
name: M.O.R.B.I.U.S.
text: Forced Response: After the engaged hero generates any number of resources, deal an equal amount of damage to that hero. (SP//dr's nemesis minion.)

flavor: The Iron Spider's Sinister Six are on an crime spree, robbing every business they come across.
name: Grand Larceny
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Criminal]] minion is in play.

attack_text: Divide damage from Bombshell's attack among each character the attacked player controls as evenly as possible.
boost_text: Deal 1 indirect damage to each player. Exhaust each character damaged this way.
name: Bombshell

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Hobgoblin would attack you, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to Hobgoblin's ATK instead. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way.
name: Hobgoblin

boost_text: Discard the top 7 cards of the encounter deck.
name: Sandman
text: Forced Response: After Sandman takes any amount of damage from an attack, discard the top 7 cards of the encounter deck.
